thread.title: You’ll totally feel like Shakespeare with Storybook Cosmetics’ new stand for their Quill and Ink liner duo
thread.title_full: You’ll totally feel like Shakespeare with Storybook Cosmetics’ new stand for their Quill and Ink liner duo

author: Amanda Grace
title: You’ll totally feel like Shakespeare with Storybook Cosmetics’ new stand for their Quill and Ink liner duo
text:
You’ll totally feel like Shakespeare with Storybook Cosmetics’ new stand for their Quill and Ink liner duo Grab a leather journal, and get ready to feel like a Shakespearean poet! The Storybook Cosmetics Quill and Ink Eyeliner set is a gorgeous throwback to the dreamiest form of writing. From the wax seals adorning Kat Von D Beauty products to the blushing hues of the ABH Modern Renaissance palette , makeup holds firm ties to romantic eras of the past .
The gilded quill brush features a fine tip to build the perfect poetically lined eye. The pot inky black liner features a charmed lid. We’re hoping Storybook Cosmetics is working on the perfect writing desk (or in this case a vanity) stand. The quill holder will protect the brush’s tip, and the entire set will come in tin packaging.
Storybook Cosmetics takes packaging to a magical level! We didn't forget about our Quill and Ink eyeliner duo. We were just busy creating a stand! (It's hollow and the brush tip does not touch the sides or the bottom.) Up next, a tin box to store the set, and finalizing our formula! On track for a spring release! #storybookcosmetics 
A post shared by @storybookcosmetics on Feb 20, 2017 at 8:38pm PST 
The set should be hitting digital shelves soon! Thank you for the feature @trendmood1 UPDATE: we are working on a stand for the quill! You asked for it and we completely agree! Hopefully we can make it work! 
A post shared by @storybookcosmetics on Jan 3, 2017 at 3:42pm PST 
The Quill and Ink set is due for a spring release, and we could not be more excited! Storybook will probably announce a pre-sale once the packaging is finalized. We aren’t sure about an actual date or price point just yet, but this is sure to be one holy grail liner set.
Our "Quill & Ink" set needed a little something else. How about a tin storage box? 
A post shared by @storybookcosmetics on Jan 2, 2017 at 7:49pm PST 
Remember, if you want to get your muggle hands on the Wizardry and Witchcraft Eyeshadow palette, it goes on pre-sale this Friday! ❤❤❤ Palette Pre-Order Feb 24, 11am CST 
A post shared by @storybookcosmetics on Feb 17, 2017 at 2:12pm PST 
Who doesn’t want to feel like a romantic poet while sweeping on eyeliner strokes? Keep an eye out for the Storybook Cosmetics Quill and Ink set this spring!
